name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Juan

reviews.text: The hotel is nicely located approx 2 blocks from the beach. Great breakfast, with friendly staff! The beds and pillows are excellent....I went down with a bunch of teenagers, so we have a couple of rooms. I thought the suites were on the small side. Hotel staff is friendly and keeps the 100% satisfaction guarantee at heart. I found the front desk personnel friendly and always ready to help.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites San Juan Hotel
description: At Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton San Juan you can relax and enjoy our beautiful recently renovated pool and Jacuzzi® area. Indulge yourself at our Guacamayo Pool Bar & Grill!
